name: gardr
description: Library for managing external content in iframes

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p browserified && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -s gardrHost lib/hostBundle.js -o browserified/hostBundle.js && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/extBundle.js -o browserified/extBundle.js
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run browserify && node app.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run browserify && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --single-run --browser PhantomJS

author: FINN.no AS
